title: Amazon Relents: Begins Selling Rowling's 'Silkworm'
teaser: J.K. Rowling's new book, The Silkworm, has been caught up in Amazon's ongoing fight with publisher Hachette Book Group. Amazon has been delaying delivery on more than 5,000 of Hachette's titles
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
